scripts.icon:mono: pnpm dlx @svgr/cli --config-file .svgrrc.mono.json --out-dir src/assets/icons/mono --index-template _templates/svgr-index-template.js --template _templates/svgr-template.js public/assets/icons/mono && biome check --fix src/assets/icons/mono
scripts.icon:colored: pnpm dlx @svgr/cli --config-file .svgrrc --out-dir src/assets/icons/colored --index-template _templates/svgr-index-template.js --template _templates/svgr-template-colored.js public/assets/icons/colored && biome check --fix src/assets/icons/colored
scripts.icon: pnpm run icon:mono && pnpm run icon:colored
